definition: to care for/to show concern for/to think longingly (of one's country)
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: But the Dallas-based carrier isn't just looking at Boeing.
sentences.chinese: 但這家總部位於達拉斯的承運商不僅僅只是眷顧波音。

sentences.english: You don't need me to explain the luck, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 關於幸運之神眷顧，我猜完全用不着解釋了。

sentences.english: I'll cross my fingers for you today.
sentences.chinese: 希望幸運之神今天會眷顧你。

sentences.english: The Guardian I note did not favour me with an obituary.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到，《衛報》毫不眷顧於我，連個訃告都不登。

sentences.english: 'God bless me, ' he says with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 他面帶笑容地說道，“上帝很眷顧我。”

sentences.english: We should wait without the consciousness of time.
sentences.chinese: 我們等不來時間的眷顧。

sentences.english: Because nobody is perfect, and nobody deserves to be perfect.
sentences.chinese: 因爲世上無完人，每個人都不值得完美的眷顧。

sentences.english: Good luck in all my life, all in my blessing, remember.
sentences.chinese: 一生好運眷顧，全在我的祝福，記得收藏。

sentences.english: And oh, I know just by knowing you I was blessed.
sentences.chinese: 我就知道，你我相識開始，幸運之神一直在眷顧。

sentences.english: When you are mindful you are in balance with the universe.
sentences.chinese: 當你眷顧的時候你將和宇宙保持平衡。

sentences.english: But as the marigold at the sun's eye.
sentences.chinese: 不過像太陽眷顧下的金盞花。

sentences.english: May the Great Eye watch over you.
Meet you, is my lucky, or just passing by …
sentences.chinese: 遇見你，是幸運之神眷顧我，即使只是與你擦肩而過。

sentences.english: The trouble comes when people who are larger-than-life continue to consume excess calories.
sentences.chinese: 麻煩只眷顧於那些食入過量卡路里的“非常人”。

sentences.english: Clearly the revered Amun was smiling on his chosen one.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，尊敬的阿蒙大神正眷顧着他的神選者。

sentences.english: My heart is a little potato favored by Fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我的心是一個被幸運女神眷顧的小土豆。

definition: asylum/shelter/to shield/to put under protection/to take under one's wing
favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
